entries.title: Elon Musk Says Twitter 'Will, In Fact, Be OK Next Year'
entries.description: The billionaire CEO said the social-media company he recently acquired was on track to log $3 billion in negative free-cash flow before his cost cuts.

entries.title: The End of Netflix Password Sharing Is Nigh
entries.description: More than 100 million viewers use borrowed passwords to watch content on the streaming giant. Putting a stop to the practice without alienating customers will be a challenge.

entries.title: ChatGPT Wrote My AP English Essay. I Passed.
entries.description: OpenAI’s new chatbot can write essays on complex topics. Our columnist went back to high school AP Literature to see how good those essays are.

entries.title: Cybersecurity Firms Cut Staff as Fears About Economy, Funding Mount
entries.description: The wave of layoffs started this summer and has spanned departments, including workers in technical roles.

entries.title: NFL in Advanced Talks With Google's YouTube for 'Sunday Ticket' Rights Deal
entries.description: The subscription-only package allows football fans to watch most Sunday afternoon games.
